column2: "Mma nntwuw ɔpanyin enyim
column3: na mbom tu no fo dɛ egya; na mberantsɛ no dɛ enuanom;"

column2: "mbaampanyin no dɛ nanom; nkataasia no dɛ nkyerɛbaa
column3: wɔ ahotsew nyina mu."

column2: "Ekunafo a wɔyɛ ekunafo ara ampa no
column3: dzi hɔn nyi."

column2: "Na sɛ okunafo bi wɔ mba anaa mbanana a
column3: wɔmma wonsua dɛ wodzi kan kyerɛ nyamesompa wɔ hɔn efiefi do
column4: na wontua hɔn awofo kaw; na iyi na ɔsɔ enyi wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim."

column2: "Na nyia ɔyɛ okunafo ampa
column3: na aka no nko no
column5: na osuo nkotoserɛ asɔr nye mpaabɔ mu adzekyee nye adzesaa."

column2: "Na nyia ɔdze noho ma wiadze enyigye no
column3: ɔyɛ tseaseewu."

column2: "Na nsɛm yi na kyerɛkyerɛ hɔn
column3: amma woeennya hɔn ho asɛm bi annka."

column2: "Na sɛ obi annhwɛ nankasa nedze
column3: nkanka ne fiefo a
column5: ɔyɛ nyimpa bɔn kyɛn nyia ɔnngye nndzi mpo."

column2: "Mma wɔmmfa obi a onnyae nndzii mfe eduosia mmfora ekunafo nnkan. Ɔwɔ dɛ ɔyɛ obi a ɔawar kun kor
column4: "na wɔbɔ no dzin pa wɔ ndwuma ho dɛ: ɔatsetse mbofra
column7: ɔaboa hɔn a wɔakɔ ahohia mu
column8: na ɔdze no ho ama ndwuma pa nyina."

column2: "Na ekunafo a wonnyinii dze
column3: mma nngye hɔn; osiandɛ sɛ Kraest ho fon hɔn a

column2: "na wonya afɔbu dɛ wɔapow gyedzi a odzi kan no."
"Na no mu ara so na wosua enyihaw
column3: kyimakyima efiefi; na nnyɛ enyihaw nko
column4: na wɔyɛ anobɛrbɛr nye agyegyensɛm mu so
column5: keka nsɛm a ɔnnsɛ hɔn dɛ wɔka."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mepɛ dɛ hɔn a wonnyinii no
column3: wɔwar
column6: na wɔaamma ɔtamfo biara kwan mma ɔaannyaw hɔn;"

column2: "osiandɛ binom adan ekedzi abɔnsam ekyir dada."
"Na sɛ ɔbaa gyedzinyi  bi wɔ ekunafo a
column3: wɔmma ɔmboa hɔn; na mma wɔnnyɛ adzesoa mma asɔr; ama asɔr no aaboa hɔn a wɔyɛ ekunafo ara ampa no."

column2: "Mpanyimfo a wodzi panyin yie no
column3: wombu hɔn dɛ wɔsɛ enyidzi mbɔho
column4: nkanka hɔn a wɔyɛ edwuma wɔ asɛm no nye nkyerɛkyerɛ mu no."

column2: "Na kyerɛw no ka dɛ
column3: Mma nnkyekyer nantwi a ɔporow eburow no n’ano

column2: "Mma nntsie ɔpanyin ho ntoatoa
column3: gyedɛ adasefo beenu anaa baasa anomu."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔyɛ bɔn no ka hɔn enyim
column3: ama nkaa no so eesuro."

column2: "Mehyɛ wo wɔ Nyankopɔn nye Ewuradze Kraest Jesus nye abɔfo a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn no enyim dɛ
column3: hwɛ yinom yie
column5: eso mma nnyɛ biribiara nyiyimu do."

column2: "Mma mmfa wo nsa nngu obiara do awerɛfir mu
column3: na eso mmfa woho mmfora binom hɔn bɔn; sie woho krɔnn."

column2: "Mma nnda ho nnom nsu nko
column3: na wo yafun nye wo mberɛw a etɔ yɛ ntsi

column2: "Nyimpa binom hɔn bɔn da edzi dzi hɔn enyim dze hɔn rokɔ atsɛmbu mu
column3: na binom dze dzi hɔn ekyir."

column2: "Dɛmara na ndwuma pa so da edzi; na dza ɔsor mbrɛ ɔtse no mpo nntum nnhuntsa."
